ComicInfo.Inker: Al Vey,Armando Durruthy,Marlo Alquiza,Sal Regla,Wellington Diaz
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:13:57 [Issue ID 4000-103745] urn:comicvine:4000-103745 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 07:00:42. [Issue ID 103745]
ComicInfo.Summary: It all comes to a head. Gina, an operative of the Puritans, has made it back to the dawn of time when aliens first arrived on Earth. Will she succeed in destroying the Kherubim and Daemonite bloodlines forever, or can the WildC.A.T.s, who have already lost two members on their trek back through time, stop her? It's an action packed and explosive conclusion to the biggest WildC.A.T.s adventure of all time!
ComicInfo.Title: When Worlds Collide Part 2
